channel.title: Forcing login
channel.description:
Is there anything that's already in the client that would allow me to force a login without someone actually clicking the login button?
For example, if I set a a username and password when the client loads, is there anything that would make it auotmatically login without the choice of changing?

item.title: Forcing login
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:3, topic:465903”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=572947.msg4139151#msg4139151 date=1351975103]

Is there anything that’s already in the client that would allow me to force a login without someone actually clicking the login button?

For example, if I set a a username and password when the client loads, is there anything that would make it auotmatically login without the choice of changing?

Yes, just call the login method when the client is done loading
[/quote]

Oh it’s that simple… Thanks[/quote]

Pretty much. Just have to pass the username and password to the method, as well as “false” for the reconnecting flag.

Read full topic
